title: Courage.Mountain.avi
description:
Courage Mountain: Heidi&#039;s New Adventure, a sequel to Johanna Spyri&#039;s novel "Heidi".

In the middle of World War I, Heidi is now fifteen years old and sent to a school for girls in Italy. When the troupes take over the school building, Heidi and her friends are sent to an "orphanage", but they manage to escape and decide to cross the Swiss alps to safety.

Starring Juliette Caton as Heidi, Charlie Sheen as Peter and Leslie Caron as Madame Hillary.
